items.title: 50 Treasure Tokens
items.description: Use Treasure Tokens to open Bounties that contain Star Content, tacticians, arenas, and more!

items.title: 520 Star Shards + 55 Bonus Star Shards
items.description: Use these Star Shards to star up your Little Legends! All Star Shards and their upgrade uses are non-refundable.

items.title: 1040 Star Shards + 160 Bonus Star Shards
items.description: Use these Star Shards to star up your Little Legends! All Star Shards and their upgrade uses are non-refundable.

items.title: 130 Star Shards
items.description: Use these Star Shards to star up your Little Legends! All Star Shards and their upgrade uses are non-refundable.

items.title: Boba Bundle
items.description: Includes Boba Sprite and “Boba Blast” booms.

items.title: Batch of Barons
items.description: Includes Exclusive Monsters Attack Baron variants and Baron 'Smiteback!' boom.

items.title: Chibi Janna Pass Bundle
items.description: Includes Chibi Janna, “Howling Gale” boom, ”Storm's Coming!!!” emote, and the Cyber City: Phase 1 Pass+.

items.title: Cyber City Starter Bundle
items.description: Includes Pulsefire Knife Pup Tier 1, 200 Star Shards, and “Jolly and Jaded” emote.

items.title: Chibi Riven Pass Bundle
items.description: This bundle includes TFT Cyber City Phase 1 Pass+, Chibi Riven, Blade of the Exile Boom, and the I Challenge You Emote

items.title: Chibi Kayle Pass Bundle
items.description: Includes Chibi Kayle, "Divine Judgment" boom, "Bask in My Glory" emote, and the Cyber City: Phase 2 Pass+.

items.title: Chibi Briar Pass Bundle
items.description: Includes Chibi Briar, "Certain Death" boom, and the Cyber City: Phase 2 Pass+.

items.title: 6th Anniversary Bundle
items.description: Includes Birthday Buddy Cuppy, Cookies 'n' Scream Cuppy and the Cyber City: Phase 2 Pass+.

items.title: K.O. Coliseum Starter Bundle
items.description: Includes Kiko, "Tempting Spirit" emote, and 50 Treasure Tokens.

items.title: K.O. Coliseum Pass Bundle
items.description: Includes Spirit Blossom Kiko, "The Way of the K.O." portal, "The King Disapproves" emote, and the K.O. Coliseum: Part 1 Pass+.

items.title: Chibi Lillia Pass Bundle
items.description: Includes Chibi Lillia, "Watch Out! Eep!" boom, "Uwaaah!" emote, and the K.O. Coliseum: Part 1 Pass+.

items.title: K.O Coliseum Kai'sa Bundle
items.description: Includes Chibi Kaisa, "Icathian Rain" boom, "Please Don't Go!" emote, and the K.O. Coliseum: Part 1 Pass+.

items.title: Ao Shin's Ascent Guide Pack
items.description: Includes "Awakened and Enlightened" emote and Ao Shin's Ascent Guides*: "Battle Queen Gwen" and "Truth Dragon Yasuo" (*exclusive to event, for temporary use until Oct 21, 2025 PDT).

items.title: Ao Shin's Ascent Mega Bundle
items.description: Includes "Awakened and Enlightened" emote, Awakened Ao Shin, Sol Harbinger Ao Shin, TFT: K.O. Coliseum: Part 2 Pass+, and Ao Shin's Ascent Guides*: "Battle Queen Gwen" and "Truth Dragon Yasuo" (*exclusive to event, for temporary use until Oct 21, 2025 PDT).

items.title: Kapi Pass Bundle
items.description: Includes Spirit Springs Kapi 1 Star, El Tigre Whisker 1 Star, 100 Treasure Tokens, and the K.O. Coliseum: Part 2 Pass+.

items.title: K.O Coliseum Starter Bundle 2
items.description: Includes High Noon Fenroar 1 Star, 200 Star Shards, "Waaaaaah!" emote, and 50 Treasure Tokens.

items.title: Worlds 2025 Bundle
items.description: Includes "Race to Worlds 2025" portal, "Earn Your Legacy" boom,  Jetback Blepup 1 Star,  the K.O. Coliseum: Part 2 Pass+,  "Outstanding!" Emote and 250 Treasure Tokens.

items.title: Chibi Yunara Pass Bundle
items.description: Includes Chibi Yunara, "Arc of Ruin" boom and the K.O. Coliseum: Part 2 Pass+.

items.title: K.O Coliseum Yone Bundle
items.description: Includes Chibi Yone, "Fate Sealed" Boom, "Esports Pengu", "The Unforgotten Shh" Emote and the K.O. Coliseum: Part 2 Pass+.
